metadata.title: CVE-2020-36152 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.description: Buffer overflow in readDataVar in hdf/dataobject.c in Symonics libmysofa 0.5 - 1.1 allows attackers to execute arbitrary code via a crafted SOFA.

criterions.comment: libmysofa package in impish is affected and may need fixing.
